Knowledge of Quantifying the Material What equips you for the role:Minimum Qualifications, Certification and Knowledge: Diploma in Interior Design / Civil Engineering.

Good Understanding of Fitout / Civil contracts. Minimum Experience:10 years' experience in a related field of which 5 years are in a similar capacity in the Civil / Fit out Contracting companies. Job Details
